ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Arguing in it with one another, they will say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Disputing among themselves they will say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There they will quarrel with one another and the erring ones will say (to their deities):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they will say, and they will be quarrelling in it:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will say while contending therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall say while they contend therein:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They shall say, as they dispute there one with another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they will say, when they are quarrelling therein:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will dispute between themselves therein, and will say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they, While contending therein, shall say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will say, as they wrangle in it [together],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say there in their mutual bickerings:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will say while contending therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they will say while they dispute with one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, as they feud in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say while they dispute therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:96] They, the perverse, shall say, as they wrangle therein, with those whom they used to worship:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they) i.e. the disbelievers (will say, when they are quarrelling) with their deities, leaders and the offspring of Iblis (therein) in hell:
